segments.text: Wow ! What happened to you ? You look sad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just lost my job . My boss just told me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's unbelievable . Why did this happen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't understand of myself . It seems they have to save money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I cant't believe it . You've worked here for years .
segments.speaker: S1
